name: Too many mouths
description:
Timmy has a problem, and no, it's not his lack of empathy, no matter how hard people tell him. It is not.

Timmy's problem is that he is living an extreme situation and his fellow refugees are making it worse. They eat Timmy's food! And they always blame Timmy's lack of empathy for their problems.

Are they blind or what? They do not see that the fucking end of the fucking human species has arrived ?!

Play as Timmy using your lack of empathy to get rid of them or let everything go wrong and watch the world burn.

Make decisions, choose your path, face the consequences

Face your own story

(#2 at the Minijam#21: Stories - Not the hero)
